> <OLD>
>
> For the moment, WHEELIE stayed hidden over in the brush.  He was able to get
> a quick scan up in the air over at the flying DINOBOTS, or whatever these
> aerial avians were.
>
> For the moment, he did not send out a comm signal to them or announce his
> presence, just carefully and slowly going forwards, trying to track them.
> And see just where they were going, or where they were based from.

<NEW>

As the com-links are still down it is probably would not have matter
if he had tried to send a  signal or not, although a verbal one or
something visual would have worked if he had chosen to do so.

The three avian DINOBOTS did not seem to be aware of WHEELIE but were
hovering in the air amd then flapping their wings as their calls
filled the air.

Suddenly SWOOP fired a laser blast at the base of a tree, one that was
close to the edge of the gorge. However it was a blast that was
obviously not at full power. For instead of vaporizing the tree or
even setting the forest ablaze, it merely hit the tree at its base.

Then after a moment there was the sound of cracking and splintering
and another tree fell across the gorge next to the first one.

(TAG)

- Preston
